item.title: 戴尔首席财务官麦吉尔卸任，肯尼迪被任命为临时财务官
item.description: 戴尔科技公司表示，首席财务官伊冯娜-麦吉尔（Yvonne McGill）即将卸任，将由公司高级副总裁大卫-肯尼迪（David Kennedy）临时接替。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. said Chief Financial Officer Yvonne McGill is stepping down and will be replaced on an interim basis by David Kennedy, a senior vice president with the firm.】

item.title: 非洲金融家为绿色倡议认捐 1000 亿美元
item.description: 非洲金融机构计划筹集 1,000 多亿美元，用于非洲大陆的绿色计划，以促进经济增长。【原文：African financial institutions plan to raise more than $100 billion for green initiatives across the continent to fuel economic growth.】

item.title: 美国农产品贸易逆差扩大，进口激增，创历史新高
item.description: 美国农产品贸易逆差在 7 月份进一步扩大，凸显了唐纳德-特朗普总统在誓言扭转这一趋势时所面临的挑战。【原文：The US agricultural trade deficit widened further in July, highlighting the challenge facing President Donald Trump as he vows to reverse the trend.】

item.title: 亚马逊收购拉美快递初创公司 Rappi 的股份
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）已入股哥伦比亚快递公司 Rappi Inc.【原文：Amazon.com Inc. has taken a stake in the Colombian delivery company Rappi Inc., a strategic partnership that pairs the e-commerce giant’s retail and technology infrastructure with one of Latin America’s best-known last-mile delivery outfits.】

item.title: 美国消费者信用卡借贷三个月来增幅最大
item.description: 在信用卡余额今年以来最强劲增长的带动下，7 月份美国消费者借贷增长幅度为三个月来最大。【原文：US consumer borrowing rose in July by most in three months, led by the strongest gain in credit-card balances this year.】

item.title: 小组称中国黑客冒充共和党重要议员
item.description: 众议院中国问题特别委员会称，涉嫌与中国共产党有关联的网络攻击者冒充众议院中国问题特别委员会共和党主席，企图窃取一系列有关贸易谈判的敏感数据。【原文：Suspected cyber attackers linked to the Chinese Communist Party impersonated the Republican chair of the House Select Committee on China in a series of attempts to steal sensitive data on trade negotiations, the panel said.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚自 2016 年以来首次出售欧元债券
item.description: 哥伦比亚将自 2016 年以来首次发行欧元计价债券，因为在财政失衡日益加深的情况下，该国政府正在努力实现债务多样化。【原文：Colombia will issue euro-denominated bonds for the first time since 2016, as the country’s government moves to diversify its debt amid deepening fiscal imbalances.】

item.title: 参议院银行小组将于周三就米兰美联储提名进行投票
item.description: 白宫经济顾问斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）担任美联储理事的提名已定于周三在参议院委员会投票表决，此举可使他在 9 月份就削减利率进行关键投票之前获得参议院全体成员的确认。【原文：White House economic adviser Stephen Miran’s nomination as a Federal Reserve governor has been scheduled for a Senate committee vote Wednesday, a move that could allow him to be confirmed by the full Senate before a pivotal September vote on cutting interest rates.】

item.title: 纳斯达克在波动性触及收盘后取消斯德哥尔摩交易
item.description: 在北欧交易所收盘拍卖出现波动后，纳斯达克公司将取消在斯德哥尔摩证券交易所上市的 36 种证券的交易。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. will cancel trades in 36 securities listed on the Stockholm Stock Exchange after volatility hit the Nordic exchange’s closing auction.】

item.title: 孩之宝将把玩具总部迁至波士顿，创造 700 个就业机会
item.description: 大富翁棋盘游戏背后的孩之宝公司（Hasbro Inc.【原文：Hasbro Inc., the company behind the Monopoly board game, is moving its headquarters to Boston from Pawtucket, Rhode Island, boosting the city’s struggling business district and Massachusetts Governor Maura Healey’s effort to lure investments.】

item.title: 欧洲评级最高的公司再次青睐可转换债券
item.description: 投资级公司正在主导欧洲可转债市场的复兴。【原文：Investment grade companies are dominating the revival of Europe’s convertible bond market.】

item.title: 埃尔坎兄妹支付 1.83 亿欧元了结意大利税务调查
item.description: 都灵检察官周一表示，约翰-埃尔坎（John Elkann）、拉波（Lapo Elkann）和吉尼夫拉-埃尔坎（Ginevra Elkann）向意大利税务局支付了 1.83 亿欧元（约合 2.15 亿美元），以了结对其祖母玛瑞拉-卡拉乔洛（Marella Caracciolo）涉嫌未申报遗产资产的调查。【原文：John, Lapo and Ginevra Elkann paid €183 million ($215 million) to Italy’s revenue agency to settle a probe into alleged undeclared assets from their grandmother Marella Caracciolo’s inheritance, prosecutors in Turin said Monday.】

item.title: 丹-艾夫斯（Dan Ives）担任世界比特币财政部长，Eightco 跃升逾 5,600
item.description: 周一，Eightco Holdings Inc.宣布发行高达 2.5 亿美元的世界币国库券，并任命华尔街分析师丹-艾夫斯（Dan Ives）为董事会主席，该公司股价涨幅高达 5632%。【原文：Eightco Holdings Inc. saw its shares rise as much as a whopping 5,632% Monday after the e-commerce company announced an offering of up to $250 million Worldcoin treasury and named Wall Street analyst Dan Ives chairman of its board.】

item.title: 马克龙已经没有合适的法国总理人选了
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）正在不到两年的时间里寻找第五位总理，以解决该国的债务问题，而目前还没有明显的候选人有相当的成功机会。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron is seeking a fifth prime minister in less than two years to tackle the country’s debt problems and there are no obvious candidates with a decent chance of success.】

item.title: 太阳能公司 Pine Gate 在特朗普反绿色政策的推动下向顾问求助
美国银行监管机构采取行动进一步消除所谓的 "去银行化 "现象
item.description: 在一些行业团体和共和党人呼吁结束这种被批评者视为不公平的做法后，货币监理署表示将采取行动取消所谓的 "去银行化"。【原文：The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency said it would move to eliminate what’s known as debanking following calls from some industry groups and Republicans to end a practice critics have viewed as unfair.】

item.title: 尽管降息预期强烈，但小额贷款投资者仍要为 "跌跌不休 "做好准备
item.description: 周五，一份疲软的就业报告锁定了美联储将在本月继续降息的预期，市场随之反弹，但市政债券投资者在这个秋季仍将面临一场艰苦的战斗。【原文：Municipal bond investors face an uphill battle this fall season, even after markets rallied in the wake of a soft jobs report on Friday that locked in expectations the Federal Reserve will resume cutting rates this month.】

item.title: Paschi 据称将跨越 Mediobanca 50% 的门槛，赢得控制权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 赢得了 Mediobanca SpA 一半以上的投票权，实际上控制了这家意大利投资银行。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA has won over more than half of Mediobanca SpA’s voting rights, according to people familiar with the matter, effectively giving it control over the Italian investment bank.】

item.title: Citadel 的乌比德称美国经济处于 "脆弱 "平衡状态
item.description: Citadel 的顶级经济学家 Angel Ubide 认为，美国经济和劳动力市场正处于脆弱的平衡状态，而长期国债收益率是判断这种背景是否正在恶化的关键指标。【原文：The US economy and labor market are in a fragile balance, and long-term Treasury yields are the key indicator to determine whether that backdrop is deteriorating, according to Angel Ubide, a top economist at Citadel.】

item.title: Klarna 和 Netskope 首次公开募股为加拿大顶级养老基金带来收益
item.description: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（Canada Pension Plan Investment Board）准备将其持有的两家私募股权公司推向公开市场，因为科技公司对新股的需求大增。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board is poised to see two of its private equity holdings hit the public market as technology companies take advantage of the appetite for new shares.】

item.title: 瑞士立法者投票反对推迟实施瑞银资本新规
item.description: 瑞士立法者投票赞成加快出台银行资本质量新规定，此举可能使瑞银集团最早在明年将资本要求提高约 30 亿美元。【原文：Swiss lawmakers voted for a faster introduction of new rules for banks’ capital quality, a move that could raise UBS Group AG’s capital requirements by some $3 billion as early as next year.】

item.title: 有关于另一场启示录的传闻
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美国陆军授予 Anduril-META 团队、Rivet 战斗护目镜合同
item.description: 美国陆军授予由 Anduril Industries 公司和 Meta Platforms 公司组成的合伙企业以及由 Rivet Industries 公司牵头的另一家企业合同，以生产新型作战护目镜的竞争原型。【原文：The US Army awarded contracts to a partnership of Anduril Industries Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc., and another led by Rivet Industries, to produce competing prototypes of a new combat goggle.】

item.title: KNDS 首席执行官称法德油轮制造商正准备首次公开募股
item.description: KNDS NV 首席执行官让-保罗-阿拉里（Jean-Paul Alary）表示，他正在为这家法德油罐制造商的首次公开募股做准备，以扩大股东基础，促进投资和收购。【原文：KNDS NV Chief Executive Officer Jean-Paul Alary said he’s preparing the Franco-German tankmaker for an initial public offering to bolster the shareholder base and enable investments and acquisitions.】

item.title: 南非经济研究局称，投资停滞将使南非经济增长低于 2
item.description: 南非经济研究局（Bureau for Economic Research）称，南非必须加快推进拖延已久的经济改革，并对国有企业进行全面改革，以摆脱长期的低增长状态。【原文：South Africa must hasten long-delayed economic reforms and overhaul state-owned companies to escape a prolonged period of subpar growth, according to the Bureau for Economic Research.】

item.title: 阿波罗的主要欧洲 PE 合作伙伴拉巴将在 15 年后离职
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc.’s lead partner for European private equity, Michele Raba, is leaving the investment firm after 15 years.】

item.title: 纽约警察局的蒂施对联邦军队驻扎在纽约街头的想法感到 "反感
item.description: 纽约市警察局长不希望看到国民警卫队在美国最大城市的街道上巡逻，并对唐纳德-特朗普总统将军队部署到城市地区的前景感到 "反感"。【原文：New York City’s police commissioner doesn’t want to see the National Guard patrolling the streets of the nation’s biggest city and is “revolted” by the prospect of President Donald Trump deploying the military to urban areas.】

item.title: 双线称美联储降息将导致收益率曲线趋于平稳
item.description: DoubleLine Capital 的比尔-坎贝尔（Bill Campbell）表示，如果美联储推出激进的降息措施，美国的收益率曲线将进一步陡峭化。【原文：The US yield curve has further to steepen should the Federal Reserve unleash aggressive interest rate cuts, DoubleLine Capital’s Bill Campbell said.】

item.title: 灾害加剧，美国财产保险费用再创新高
item.description: 今年上半年，美国的财产保险费用创下历史新高，因为在加利福尼亚等最近受到气候灾害影响的州，房主们面临着大幅涨价的问题。【原文：The cost of property insurance in the US rose to an all time-high in the first half of the year, as homeowners faced sharp price increases in states recently affected by climate-related disasters, such as California.】

item.title: 灾害每年损坏非洲 127 亿美元的基础设施
item.description: 根据抗灾基础设施联盟（Coalition for Disaster Resilient Infrastructure）的数据，在非洲，包括建筑物在内的基础设施每年因灾害造成的平均损失为 127 亿美元。【原文：The average annual loss of infrastructure including buildings caused by disasters in Africa is $12.7 billion, according to the Coalition for Disaster Resilient Infrastructure.】
